title: Load Performance Testing on Cloud Platform
abstract: Cloud computing is an on-demand, virtualized internet depended on the system with a new fast- growing information technology mechanism accepted by the organization all over the world. Several activities performed on cloud computing and checking for those functionality software testing are used. Cloud computing also provides a facility for the development of more powerful and scalable software testing technologies. This paper gives an overview of cloud services and tools (SOASTA and ITKO LISA) with respect to software testing.
venue: 2018 International Conference on Advances in Computing, Communication Control and Networking (ICACCCN)

journal.name: 2018 International Conference on Advances in Computing, Communication Control and Networking (ICACCCN)

citations.title: Using regression learners to predict performance problems on software updates: a case study on elevators dispatching algorithms
